price: (19) And [then] you did your deed which you did,[1046] and you were of the ungrateful."
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [1046]- i.e., striking the Copt, who died as a result.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
